page.title: 16WILD FLOWERS IN KNIVETON
page.content: In the area around Kniveton,Hognaston, and Atlow there are all kinds of wild flowers. The flowers grow in the fields,along the many hedgerows,and in the roadside verges which are left to grow naturally. There are many lanes and footpaths which allow people to enjoy these colourful flowers. In a short walk along Washpool Lane,near to Kniveton School,we found thirty different kinds of flowers in bloom.There were Speedwell,Forget-me-nots,Meadow Cranesbill,Pink Campion, Wild Roses,and so on.They look very pretty.
